name: Fancy Doodle
description: A web and Mac app for white boarding, prototyping and jammin out cool ideas. Basically, it should be the default Mac desktop. :)

name: Gif Jif Maker
description: A web app designed for animated gif generation. Collapsable UI and multiple features which export as a finished .gif file.

name: Image Crop
description: A web app which helps you simply crop and resize your images.

name: Image Zoom Resize
description: A web app which batch converts images in multiple zoom states as well as square, portrait and landscape orientations.
